publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5214 Gil Paterson: West Dunbartonshire Success in Regeneration Funding Bidâ€”That the Parliament congratulates West Dunbartonshire Council on its successful bid to receive funding from the Town Centre Regeneration Fund and believes that the schemes in Clydebank South Bank and Dumbarton town centre will be of great benefit, not only to the local economies as these communities attempt to get through the economic downturn, but also to the people of Dumbarton and Clydebank themselves.

S3M-5214 West Dunbartonshire Success in Regeneration Funding Bid (lodged on 17 November 2009) Alasdair Allan*, Stuart McMillan*, Michael Matheson*, Bob Doris*, Christina McKelvie*, Sandra White*, Bill Kidd*
S3M-5214 West Dunbartonshire Success in Regeneration Funding Bid (lodged on 17 November 2009) Des McNulty*
